name: Chainsaw Man Concept Demo
description:
WORK IN PROGRESS ... until the law stops me (╥﹏╥)

This is a Chainsaw Man Fan Game. The current version is a prototype/demo so there's not much gameplay and most of it is from assets but I plan to update/change it over time. Im currently curious to see how well the current demo would perform on mobile and PC. And it will ALWAYS be FREE!

The demo is still very glitchy so at any point it stops working, Press [R] button on the keyboard or the restart icon on mobile to reload the level.

For a more cinematic feel, play Kick Back in the background.

Banner Image: @OfficialEaero (free wallpaper)
Chainsaw Man Model: james94 on cgtrader
Environment: Unity Asset Store Japanese Street

Controls:

Move - WASD

Attack 1 - Left Mouse Button

Attack 2 - Right Mouse Button

Jump - Space Bar

Run - Hold Shift and Move

Some Attack Combos:

Run and Attack 1

Attack 1  - Attack 1 - Attack 2

Attack 2  - Attack 2 - Attack 2 - Attack 1

Hold Down Attack 1 or Attack 2
